# 添加或删除风控名单 API Sample

## Request

```bash
curl --request POST \
  --url https://pay-gate-uat.payermax.com/aggregate-pay/api/gateway/addOrDelRiskNameList \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'sign: ' \
  --data '{
  "version": "1.0",
  "keyVersion": "1",
  "requestTime": "2022-01-17T09:05:52.194+00:00",
  "merchantAppId": "{{merchantAppId}}",
  "merchantNo": "{{merchantNo}}",
  "data": {
    "nameType": "BLACK",
    "remark": "remark",
    "operateType": "ADD",
    "requestId": "test001",
    "nameList": [
      {
        "value": "user001",
        "key": "NEG0002",
        "expireType": "DAY"
      }
    ]
  }
}'
```

## Response

```json
{
  "code": "APPLY_SUCCESS",
  "msg": " Success.",
  "data": {
    "requestId": "test001"
  }
}
```
